content:
During the day, the Aviation of Defense Forces struck 9 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

"The departments of rocket troops have defeated 1 air defense means, 1 artillery, 1 station of the IU, 1 area of concentration of personnel and 1 UAV management of the enemy," the message reads.

We will remind, during the day the enemy is 45 timesTried to break through the defenseof our troops.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Armed Forces in the SouthDestroyed112 occupiers, 8 artistem and 2 SPR.
title: Ukrainian Art has destroyed the air defense tool, UAV control station and Artzassibs of the Russians
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about it. “The missile troops were inflicted ...
author: Army Inform
